title:
What did the Lit up large X  on the ILM Airport Runway the other week. 



There was a photo of it I believe in one of your articles as well. 



It could be see from MLK. 



It had a generator hooked up. 



I assume it meant that runway was closed, if so why?



Just curious. Thanks!
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question.



http://backseat.blogs.starnewsonline.com/10348/whats-with-the-large-xs-at-ilm/
